name: The glimmering crown of Gruumsh
data: It increases the users strength slightly.
It increases the users wisdom adequately.
It has weak armour class for its type (pathetic in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration adequately.
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration pitifully.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It gives decent bonus to the skill 'weapon skill 1h bludgeon'.
It gives decent bonus to the skill 'weapon skill 2h bludgeon'.
